entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
